title: gmail invite
body: <p>Well, I tried to donate an invite to <a href="http://www.isipp.com/gmail4troops/">GMail 4 Troops</a>, but I haven't gotten a response.  So post if you want a <a href="http://gmail.google.com">gmail</a> account.</p><p><del>[UPDATE:] I just got 3 more invites.</del></p><p>[EDIT]: I get 6 a day, post in this thread if you still need one: <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/09/03/more_free_gmail_invites.aspx" title="more free gmail invitations">GMail invites</a>.</p>
